title: LabTOP: A Unified Model for Lab Test Outcome Prediction on Electronic Health Records
details: S Im, J Oh, E Choi - arXiv preprint arXiv:2502.14259, 2025
abstract: Lab tests are fundamental for diagnosing diseases and monitoring patient conditions. However, frequent testing can be burdensome for patients, and test results may not always be immediately available. To address these challenges, we …

title: InfEHR: Resolving Clinical Uncertainty through Deep Geometric Learning on Electronic Health Records
details: J Kauffman, E Holmes, A Vaid, AW Charney, P Kovatch… - medRxiv, 2025
abstract: Electronic health records (EHRs) contain multimodal data that can inform diagnostic and prognostic clinical decisions but are often unsuited for advanced machine learning (ML)–based patient-specific analyses. ML models and clinical heuristics …
